snippet: To Hitler's other low opinions of the British Prime Minister he would doubtless be willing to add that the man is no orator. Certainly he is not, if oratory means what Hitler thinks it means. Yet of the two speeches of the last two...
lead_paragraph: To Hitler's other low opinions of the British Prime Minister he would doubtless be willing to add that the man is no orator. Certainly he is not, if oratory means what Hitler thinks it means. Yet of the two speeches of the last two
